ai-tha-ap357:1.2_0: I’ve cut off the bamboo work.
ai-tha-ap357:2.3_0: The mangoes, having given a mango,
ai-tha-ap357:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap357:3.2_0: I gave a gift to a stick
ai-tha-ap357:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap357:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhaddiya.
ai-tha-ap357:6.1_0: The fifth section on the speakers of punishment
